issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Debugging the iOS module using Xcode  as explained https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/iOS+Module+Project#iOSModuleProject-Testthemodule is broken. It is giving error 'ti.main.js file not found' .
fields.summary: iOS: Linking test application and the module projects gives error

comments.body:
I think this is a duplicate of TIMOB-26807. Workaround:
# Build for device (appc run -T device) and then open the Xcode project
# Add a new run script phase with the contents mentioned in the linked ticket.
